# AXIS BANK LIMITED
## COMMERCIAL BANKING PRICING GUIDE
### Schedule C - Fee Structure (Effective January 1, 2025)

---

**Bank:** Axis Bank Limited  
**Regulatory Authority:** Reserve Bank of India  
**Catalogue Version:** Axis-COM-2025  
**Effective Date:** January 1, 2025  
**Strategy:** Growth-Oriented Aggressive Pricing

---

## 1. PRICING STRATEGY

Axis Bank offers aggressive pricing to capture market share in the commercial banking segment. We provide early adopter discounts, promotional rates, and flexible terms for growing businesses.

All fees in INR, exclusive of 18% GST. Annual escalation 3.5% p.a. effective January 1.

---

## 2. CASH MANAGEMENT

**Account Maintenance:** INR 2,600/month  
**Daily Statement (Email):** INR 120/statement  
**Monthly Reconciliation:** INR 700/report  
**Custom Reports:** INR 1,200/report  

---

## 3. DOMESTIC PAYMENTS

**ACH File:** INR 450/file  
**ACH Transaction:** INR 2.50/transaction  
**RTGS:** INR 45/transaction  
**NEFT:** INR 22/transaction  
**Cheque Processing:** INR 30/cheque  
**Standing Instruction Setup:** INR 300 (one-time)  
**Standing Instruction Monthly:** INR 300/month  

---

## 4. INTERNATIONAL PAYMENTS

**SWIFT Wire:** INR 800/transaction  
**FATCA Screening:** INR 60/transaction  
**Correspondent Charges:** Actual + 5.5% handling  
**FX Markup:** 0.70% on spot  

---

## 5. TRADE FINANCE

**LC Issuance:** INR 13,500/LC  
**LC Amendment:** INR 4,500/amendment  
**LC Negotiation:** INR 3,000/document set  
**LC Discrepancy:** INR 3,500/LC  
**Bank Guarantee:** INR 11,000/guarantee (1 year)  
**Additional Year:** INR 2,200/year  

---

## 6. DIGITAL SERVICES

**Online Portal:** INR 1,000/month  
**Sweep Account:** INR 2,500/month  
**API Setup:** INR 25,000 (one-time)  
**API Transaction:** INR 1.75/transaction  

---

## 7. EARLY ADOPTER PROGRAM

**First 6 Months:** 5% discount on all fees for new clients  
**Referral Bonus:** INR 10,000 credit for successful client referrals

---

## 8. CREDIT FACILITIES

**Cash Credit:** Base (8.00%) + 1.75-2.25% = 9.75-10.25% p.a.  
**Trade Credit:** Base + 1.50-2.00% = 9.50-10.00% p.a.  
**Overdraft:** 10.25-11.25% p.a.  

---

## 9. ESCALATION

**Annual:** 3.5% p.a.  
**Late Payment:** 10.5% p.a.  

---

## 10. CONTACT

**Corporate Banking:** corporate@axisbank.com | +91-22-6152-6253
